extraDescription: Programmer analyst to support Employment Insurance Automation and Service Improvements program, which will increase self-service capabilities and improve employer services and products
comments: This is a notice of the restatement of Contract 100002387 dated July 10, 2014. The contract was not captured by our financial system and the issue has been corrected since then. For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department.
